parameters.name: AutoPay
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal. Default value: false. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables auto-renewal.
*   **false**: disables auto-renewal. In this case, you can renew your instance in the console. For more information, see [Manually renew an instance](~~26352~~).

parameters.name: AutoRenew
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal for the instance. Valid values:

* *true*: enables auto-renewal.
* *false* (default): disables auto-renewal.

parameters.name: AutoRenewPeriod
parameters.description:
The subscription duration that is supported by auto-renewal. Unit: month. Valid values: **1**, **2**, **3**, **6**, and **12**.

>  This parameter is required if the **AutoRenew** parameter is set to **true**.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~DescribeInstances~~) operation to query the ID of the instance.

parameters.name: Period
parameters.description: The subscription duration of the instance. Unit: months. Valid values: **1** to **9**, **12**, **24**, and **36**.
